snippet.title: Frisky Hands-On: Playfish's Pirates Ahoy! on Facebook
snippet.description: We go hands-on with Playfish's newest Facebook game - Pirates Ahoy! For a detailed overview of what to expect from the game, check out our coverage, here: http://friskymongoose.com/frisky-hands-on-playfish-officially-launches-pirates-ahoy-on-facebook/
